South_San_Francisco.Ocean and Lee station: Ocean and Lee is a light rail stop on the Muni Metro K Ingleside line, located between the Westwood Park and Ingleside neighborhoods of San Francisco, California. The stop consists of two side platforms, with the eastbound (outbound) platform located on Ocean Avenue west of the intersection with Lee Street, and vice versa. It originally opened in 1906 on the United Railroads 12 line; K Ingleside service began in 1945.
